Name: Copy as CSS selector
Description: Can I copy a node's path as a CSS selector?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: In the **Elements** tab, right click on the element in the DOM tree > Copy > Copy selector.
Chrome.Name: Copy as CSS selector

Firefox.Notes: 1. In the **Inspector** tab, right click on the element in the DOM tree > Copy > CSS Selector.
Firefox.Name: Copy as CSS selector

Edge.Notes: In the **Elements** tab, right click on the element in the DOM tree > Copy > Copy selector.
Edge.Name: Copy as CSS selector

Safari.Name: Copy as CSS selector
Safari.Notes: In the **Elements** tab, right click on the element in the DOM tree > Copy > Selector Path.

Opera.Notes: In the **Elements** tab, right click on the element in the DOM tree > Copy > Copy selector.
Opera.Name: Copy as CSS selector
